title: Nottingham Forest vs Newcastle United : Nottingham Forest vs Newcastle United : Check kick off time , possible XI , how to watch on TV , live stream
body_text:
Last weekend, Nottingham Forest's medical center saw an increase in activity with three new injuries affecting Wayne Hennessey, Brennan Johnson, and Chris Wood, making it unlikely that they will participate in upcoming games. Additionally, Anthony Gordon has been ruled out by Eddie Howe due to injury, adding to Emil Krafth's long-term absence. Furthermore, Joelinton is serving a suspension and will only be available for the next match.
Nottingham Forest vs Newcastle United: Kick off date, time
The match between Nottingham Forest and Newcastle United is set to be held at City Ground on March 17, 2023 starting 4 pm EDT.
Nottingham Forest vs Newcastle United: Possible XI
Nottingham Forest's possible XI includes Navas, Aurier, Worrall, Felipe, Lodi, Yates, Shelvey, Freuler, Lingard, Gibbs-White, and Dennis. Newcastle United's possible XI comprises Pope, Trippier, Botman, Schar, Burn, S. Longstaff, Guimaraes, Willock, Almiron, Isak, and Saint-Maximin.
Nottingham Forest vs Newcastle United: How to watch?
The match between Nottingham Forest and Newcastle United can be watched live on NBC Sports and USA Network. Alternatively, streaming services, such as Sling TV and fuboTV, offer online live streaming options for the game.
FAQs
- Who is the manager of Nottingham Forest?
Steve Cooper - Who is the manager of Newcastle United?
Eddie Howe
